body:
fixes #26096

Building a docker image with CentOS 6 and Python 2.6 fails to bootstrap from binaries because:
1. `patchelf` cannot be built with GCC 4.4.7
1. the buildcache cannot be downloaded from cloudfront

This PR works around both issues by installing `patchelf` from RPM and downloading the mirror locally.
title: Allow building CentOS 6 docker image
